name: KennedyX Music
description: KennedyX Music allow you to stream music trought the telegram voice chat feature.

ARQ_API_KEY.description: For lyric and quotly modules, get on @ARQRobot

BOT_USERNAME.description: Fill woth your blt username without @

U_BRANCH.description: This branch the repo DON'T CHANGE!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your heroku api key get from setting account.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your heroku app name, get it from top

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: If you forking, put your link on this value. if you not forking LEAVE THIS ONE!

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: Fill with your assistant username without @

BG_IMAGE.description: For background image if you playing

DEV_NAME.description: Fi with your name (for name master in /alive)

OWNER_NAME.description: Fill with your username account without @

SUDO_USERS.description: Fill with ID who you made a admin for bot (separate with space).

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Duration limit for your musicplayer (in minutes).

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Fill with your channel username without @, if you haven't one you can leave it default

GROUP_SUPPORT.description: Fill with your group username without @, if your haven't one you can leave it default
